allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Waste Wise Wagons - Smart Waste Management Platform

Implemented comprehensive waste management application with the following features:

Core Features:
- Multi-role authentication system supporting Users, Drivers, and Admins
- Real-time pickup tracking with GPS integration
- Advanced scheduling system for waste collection
- Gamified rewards program with points-based marketplace
- Interactive analytics dashboard with environmental impact metrics
- Educational resources for waste segregation and recycling

Technical Implementation:
- Frontend: React 18.3 with TypeScript for type safety
- UI Framework: Custom design system using shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Supabase for authentication, database, and real-time features
- State Management: TanStack Query for server state
- Form Handling: React Hook Form with Zod validation
- Routing: React Router v6 with protected routes
- Build Tool: Vite for fast development and optimized production builds

Architecture:
- Component-based architecture with reusable UI components
- Role-based access control (RBAC) implementation
- Responsive design following mobile-first approach
- Context API for global state (Auth, Language)
- Custom hooks for business logic separation

Includes 17 fully functional pages and 40+ reusable UI components.
EOF
)")
